exclusion: Press and release the top or bottom of the dimmer smart switch (rocker) to remove it from the network.
inclusion: Press and release the top or bottom of the dimmer smart switch (rocker) to add it in the network.
label: GE 12725

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Night Light
parameters.overview: Defines the behavior of the blue LED. Default is Night Light mode where LED is on when switch is off.

options.label: LED on when switch is OFF
LED on when switch is ON

parameters.label: Invert Switch
parameters.overview:
Invert the ON/OFF Switch State.

Setting this parameter to Yes will change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom to ON. 

Note: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, the load will now be control

parameters.label: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
parameters.description:
This dimmer will start dimming from its current
				level.

parameters.label: On/Off Command Dim Step
parameters.overview: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameters.label: On/Off Command Dim Rate
parameters.overview:
This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution This sets how often the dim level will change.

For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change.

If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

parameters.label: Local Control Dim Step
parameters.overview: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameters.label: Local Control Dim Rate
parameters.overview:
This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution. This sets how often the dim level will change.

For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change.

If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

parameters.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
parameters.overview: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

parameters.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
parameters.overview:
This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution. This sets how often the dim level will change.

For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change.

If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.
